caption:
We’re thrilled to share that Le Prunier is now available at @thrivemarket! 🎉 Visit our stories for an exclusive link to get 30% off sitewide on your first Thrive Market order—plus a free gift!

What does it mean to be Thrive Market Approved? Their expert in-house team carefully vets every product to ensure only the best make the cut. Here are the standards you have to meet:

🌱 Trusted Ingredients: Wholesome, 100% non-gmo, and thoroughly vetted for safety
🤝 Ethical Sourcing: Fair pay, ethical labor practices, strict quality standards, and safe working conditions
🌍 Planet Positive: Sustainability-driven practices for a healthier future
💫 On a Mission: Working to support people, animals, and our planet
💚 Tasted & Tested: After meeting all the standards, their team asks themselves one last question: Do we LOVE it?

We’re honored to join Thrive Market’s thoughtfully curated community of conscious brands. Pop over to their site and start exploring ✨

#leprunier #thrivemarket
